author: sourceforge-skipoles
msg: Word class must be serializable for clustering

author: jonl
msg: Reworked SharedResource a bit to address clustering issues for Chris.
I think the new structure will work finally, but I don't have a cluster
to test it on (which is why I checked in code that didn't work the first time).
See SharedResource javadoc and updated Images and Hangman applications for
details on how this works now.  Updated tree to use this new style.
Also, added a small change for Johan to get rid of inefficient asString()
implementation in StringBufferResouce and StringResource.  Nice find!

author: ehillenius
msg: removed target dir override; target dir is now maven default: target

author: dashorst
msg: Updated target directory to 'target'. Eclipse was already generating the main java stuff into the 'target' directory, and put the 'test' stuff into 'build'. Fixed this.
